/** * This is the main Xerces SAX parser class. It uses the abstract SAX * parser with a document scanner, a dtd scanner, and a validator, as * well as a grammar pool. * * @author Arnaud Le Hors, IBM * @author Andy Clark, IBM * * @version $Id: SAXParser.java,v 1.39 2005/05/04 03:56:45 mrglavas Exp $ */
